verses.name: John 1:41
verses.text: He first findeth his own brother Simon, and saith unto him, We have found the Messias, which is, being interpreted, the Christ.

verses.name: John 1:42
verses.text: And he brought him to Jesus. And when Jesus beheld him, he said, Thou art Simon the son of Jona: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is by interpretation, A stone.

verses.name: John 1:43
verses.text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee, and findeth Philip, and saith unto him, Follow me.

verses.name: John 1:44
verses.text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida, the city of Andrew and Peter.
